name: Thrive Agritech
headline: We design and manufacture energy efficient LED lighting fixtures forâ¦
description:
Thrive Agritech designs and manufactures advanced lighting fixtures for indoor agriculture. We have a patent pending LED lighting system that precisely targets various photosynthetic spectrums.

Many thousands of our LED lighting fixtures have been installed in some of the world's leading indoor farms. Our products are saving millions of watt-hours of energy every day in vertical farms, greenhouses and cannabis production facilities.

Agritech expands beyond lighting and so do we. Our R&D team is actively involved in creating advanced sensor and communications networks to work with both human and artificial intelligence to create the optimized farm of the future.

# Professional grade LED grow lights 
[LEARN MORE ](http://www.thriveagritech.com/</products/>)
### Thrive Agritech is changing the way the world cultivates by advancing the science of LED grow lighting
Thrive Agritech is enabling indoor farmers to do more with less by pushing the technological boundaries of commercial LED grow lights. We have been at the forefront of LED technology and horticultural lighting for several years, helping our customers with a unique blend of scientific know-how and cultivation experience. Lighting is often the most critical component of a successful indoor farm and it is our mission to ensure that it is also the highest performance.
### Customer Spotlights
**Indoor Single Tier**
**Greenhouse Cannabis**
**Greenhouse Horticulture**
**Greenhouse Efficiency Rebate**
### Applications
Whether you are growing kale in a greenhouse or cannabis in a warehouse, Thrive Agritech’s LED lighting products are designed to uniformly and efficiently provide Photosynthetically Active Radiation (PAR) that grows great plants.
[![LED Greenhouse Lighting](https://www.thriveagritech.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/inset_greenhouse_1808_2col.jpg) Greenhouse Supplemental Lighting Bigger harvests and healthier plants with LED lights that are easy to install and virtually maintenance-free.](http://www.thriveagritech.com/</applications/greenhouse/> "Vertical Farming")
[![LED Lighting Indoor Farming](https://www.thriveagritech.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/inset_indoor_1808_2col.jpg) Indoor Cannabis High efficiency LED grow lights that deliver the light precisely where you want it — and nowhere else.](http://www.thriveagritech.com/</applications/indoor/>)
[![Vertical farming](https://www.thriveagritech.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/inset_verticalfarming.jpg) Vertical Farming Excellent uniformity across the canopy at distances as close as 6”. External driver lowers cost while simplifying installation and maintenance.](http://www.thriveagritech.com/</applications/vertical-farming/>)
[![LED Under Canopy Light](https://www.thriveagritech.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/inset_undercanopy.jpg) Under Canopy Increase cannabis flower production by more than 10% by adding light below the canopy.](http://www.thriveagritech.com/</applications/under-canopy-1/> "Under Canopy Lighting")
### [Introducting OptiDrive!](http://www.thriveagritech.com/</products/optidrive/>)
Remote power systems for new construction and retrofits that lower costs of your lighting system while improving reliability.
[Learn More](http://www.thriveagritech.com/</products/optidrive/>)
[![OptiDrive LED grow lights remote power system](https://www.thriveagritech.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/optidrive_three_components-1220x456.jpg)](http://www.thriveagritech.com/</products/optidrive>)
### Products
High performance grow lights with patent-pending LED technology that grow the best plants possible. Lights that are easy to install and maintain, UL listed and backed with a 5-year warranty to ensure peace of mind.
[![Thrive Agritech Pinnacle HP LED Light](https://www.thriveagritech.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/inset_pinnacle_hp.jpg) Pinnacle HP **Power:** 840W **Best for:** Sea-of-Green Cannabis Greenhouse Supplemental](http://www.thriveagritech.com/</products/pinnacle-hp/> "Pinnacle HP")
[![Thrive Agritech Pinnacle Commercial 600w LED Grow Light](https://www.thriveagritech.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/inset_pinnacle.jpg) Pinnacle **Power:** 600W **Best for:** Sea-of-Green Cannabis Greenhouse Supplemental](http://www.thriveagritech.com/</products/pinnacle/> "Pinnacle")
[![Boost XE LED Light](https://www.thriveagritech.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/inset_boost_xe_250207.jpg) Boost XE **Power:** 120W **Best for:** Multi-tier Cannabis Flower Multi-tier Cannabis Veg Single-tier Leafy Greens](http://www.thriveagritech.com/</products/boost/> "Boost XE")
[![Thrive Agritech Infinity XE Commercial LED Grow Light close up of the end](https://www.thriveagritech.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/inset_infinity2.0.jpg) Infinity XE **Power:** 60W **Best for:** Propagation Multi-tier Leafy Greens Multi-tier Cannabis Veg](http://www.thriveagritech.com/</products/infinity/> "Infinity XE")
[![Thrive Agritech Strata LED](https://www.thriveagritech.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/inset_strata.jpg) Strata **Power:** 30W **Best for:** Leafy Greens Microgreens Herbs Vegetables](http://www.thriveagritech.com/</products/strata/> "Strata")
[![Strata HP](https://www.thriveagritech.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/inset_product_strata_hp.jpg) Strata HP **Power:** Universal **Best for:** Multi-Tier Flower Multi-Tier Veg](http://www.thriveagritech.com/</products/strata-hp/> "Strata")
### Customers Include:

![Vertical Harvest logo](https://www.thriveagritech.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/logo_vh_farms.jpg)

generated_description:
**Thrive Agritech** is a forward-thinking company specializing in energy-efficient LED lighting solutions for indoor agriculture. It was founded in 2015 and proudly features in the Y Combinator Batch S15. Headquartered in New York with a small team of eight, Thrive Agritech has made significant strides in optimizing the growth of plants in controlled environments.

The company's mission revolves around designing and manufacturing high-performance LED lighting fixtures that cater specifically to the needs of various agricultural sectors, including vertical farms, greenhouses, and cannabis cultivation. Their patent-pending LED system is notable for its precision in targeting photosynthetic spectrums, which is crucial for plant growth. With thousands of installations worldwide, Thrive Agritech's products are saving millions of watt-hours of energy each day, proving both effective and sustainable.

But Thrive Agritech isn't just about lighting; it’s pushing the boundaries of technology through research and development of advanced sensor and communication networks that integrate human and artificial intelligence. The vision? To create the optimized farm of the future.

Their product lineup includes various models, such as the **Pinnacle HP**, **Boost XE**, and **Infinity XE**, each tailored for specific farming applications, from leafy greens to multi-tier cannabis growth. They emphasize ease of installation and maintenance, supported by a five-year warranty, ensuring peace of mind for their users.

What sets Thrive Agritech apart in the crowded agritech field is not just their innovative products, but their commitment to pushing the entire industry forward through advanced technology and energy efficiency. Their growing client base includes reputable names like Pharmacann and Vertical Harvest, which is a testament to their impact and credibility in the indoor agriculture space.

For more information, check out their website at [Thrive Agritech](http://www.thriveagritech.com).
